title.rendered: Wyndham’s Women Own the Room Initiative Drives Over One Dozen Hotel Openings

content.rendered:
Surpasses 50 hotel signings while growing community base to more than 550

PARSIPPANY, N.J., March 19, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Wyndham Hotels & Resorts is celebrating a major milestone for its award-winning Women Own the RoomSM initiative, surpassing 15 hotel openings and more than 50 signings in just over 24 months.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wyndhams-women-own-the-room-initiative-drives-over-one-dozen-hotel-openings-302092103.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
